content: As previously mentioned, Sonendo total revenue for the fourth quarter of 2022 was $12.2 million, compared to $9.9 million for the fourth quarter of 2021, an increase of 24%. PI revenue was $5 million compared to $3.8 million in the fourth quarter of 2021, an increase of approximately 31%. So as we sit here at the start of the year, we're excited about the fact that we have obviously a new GentleWave G4 platform and we also have a new procedure that's being CleanFlow.
